title: Mens Oversized T Shirts Acid Wash Loose Fit Vintage Washed Tee Shirt Short Sleeve Streetwear Casual T-Shirts
description: 【Material】Mens Oversized Gradient T-Shirts are made of 100% pure cotton,High quality, light stretch. The fabric is soft. comfortable to wear, simple and fashionable.The natural cotton material is breathable, helping to regulate body temperature and preventing sweat buildup.

【Features】The men's oversized T shirt, simple and fashionable. Couples Cotton Tees, basic design, short sleeve, gradual change, crew neck, gradient, simple style, loose fit. Perfect for sports, fitness and bodybuilding.

【Matching】Vintage Tee for Men is a versatile piece that looks great with shorts, jeans, or sweatpants. Can also be worn outside with a jacket or coat; can be worn in all seasons: spring, summer, fall and winter. A classic & fashion basic T-shirt for young women and men.

【Occasion】This unisex tee tops are suitable for a wide range of casual occasions, from a day out with friends to a weekend brunch or picnic. Perfet for summer, the gym, running, parties, casual wear, and workouts. Such as rap, rock, hip hop, outdoor, dancing, skateboard, streetwear, work, date, holiday, vacation etc.
【Notes】Hand Wash In Cold Water Is Recommended. Avoid Using Bleach. Please refer to the size chart before you place your order. Please contact us if you have any problem with the products.
